dailyItems.title: Part 4: Daily Items Release
dailyItems.introText: Please enter the following usage frequency:

teaBags.name: Plastic Tea Bags
teaBags.subtitle: (e.g., tea bags, tea sachets)
teaBags.label: Number of cups of tea from plastic tea bags (cups/day)
teaBags.placeholder: Please enter the number of cups (1 tea bag usually makes 1 cup)
